case.title: BBW Seeking Love and a LTR
case.text: I am looking for someone to share my life with. I am a loyal, easy-going person whom enjoys music, movies, traveling, reading, art, traveling, sports, and spending time with family and friends. I am looking for someone who may share similar interest. I am looking for someone whom is at least 5'10 and between the ages of 28-45. I am open to all races, and would even be interested in relocating if there is a true connection. If you are looking for the same thing and maybe interested please feel free to respond. In your response please feel free to tell me a little about yourself and include a picture.
